snippet: There is a push to encourage more variety in play and court speed with an eye on the net and, in a Darwinian entertainment landscape, an eye on the clock.
abstract: ATP Tour is set to finish at World Tour finals in London and there is little concern about future of men's tennis, which has been fueled by outstanding play of four stars and their drive to win; there is, however, push to encourage more variety in play and increase court speed.
lead_paragraph: There is a push to encourage more variety in play and court speed with an eye on the net and, in a Darwinian entertainment landscape, an eye on the clock.

headline.main: Baseline Epics Spur a Debate About Court Speed
headline.print_headline: Baseline Epics Spur a Debate About Court Speed and Playing Styles
